title: Anger as pre-historic stones destroyed for French DIY store
description: A local archeologist in northwestern France's Carnac region believes 39 standing stones − known as menhirs − have been lost due to preparations for a DIY store.

title: In Tours, the extraordinary complete excavation of a medieval abbey
description: Some 20 archaeologists are working across the entirety of the Touraine region's largest Benedictine abbey. It's the first excavation of its kind in Europe.
